      Constructor (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aMoleculeTypes - Molecule types
      aBoxSize - Box size in DPD units
      aMoleculeFixationInfos - Molecule fixation infos (may be null)
      aMoleculeBoundaryInfos - Molecule boundary infos (may be null)
      aMoleculeSphereInfos - Molecule sphere infos (may be null)
      aMoleculeVelocityFixationInfos - Molecule velocity fixation infos (may be null)
      aMoleculeAccelerationInfos - Molecule acceleration infos (may be null)
      aRgCalculators - Rg calculators (may be null)
      aNearestNeighborManager - (may be null)
      aNearestNeighborDistance - Nearest-neighbor distance in DPD units
